page.title: 07HOME LIFE
page.content: The majority of people in our area said that although they did not do a great amount every day, they did their best not to eat fatty foods and try to walk whenever possible. Many people said that they did not go out too often to supper as they were very busy, and only a few said that they went out regulary. The majority of people living in Babcary were retired and so they had plenty of time to do gardening and their gardening was very impressive. Most people other than farmers said that although they were Christians, few actually went to church. The farmers said that life was so busy for them 7 days a week that they could not find the time off to go to church.
